name: pnp-powerplatform-prompts-social-media-engagement-analyzer
title: Social Media Engagement Analyzer
shortDescription: This prompt analyzes social media interactions to measure engagement and user activity.
longDescription: This prompt analyzes social media interactions to measure engagement and user activity. It will output a JSON object which you can use to send to a back-end service.

metadata.value: Analyze this [social media post] and these [comments] to determine sentiment and engagement potential. Exclude the comments from the original author. Please give me advice on how to improve the engagement next time.
Use a screenshot of the social media post (PNG/JPG).
Use a screenshot of the comments (PNG/JPG).
